DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of this study is to assess the effectiveness of a school based physical activity programme on obesity and related health outcomes in young schoolchildren.
DOC.brief_title: Study on Obesity Intervention With Physical Exercise Among Students in Changping District, Beijing
DOC.criteria: Grade of 2 to 5 in elementary schools and grade of 1 to 2 in middle schools. Suffering or any history of disabilities, cardiovascular diseases, asthma, metabolic diseases, etc.
